name: Roomba War
description:
Get ready for Roomba War!

Watch a bunch of roombas fight each other to death! There's not much more about it...

Every roomba shares the same initial stats but their behaviours are implemented with a different method depending on their color:

  • Red Roombas use FMS (Finite State Machines).
  • Green Roombas use BT (Branch Trees).
  • Yellow Roombas use UT (Utility System).

By picking up the items spreaded in the arena they increase some stats like health, vision range or clock speed. This increases their chances of shooting other roombas down to take the first place in this autonomous battle-royale.

You can follow a roomba if you click on it.
